entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
